segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on those cookies that he doesn’t even realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right behind their mother’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and they don’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to stop this before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is just chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll even get caught or if they’ll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a risky move for a couple of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
